Platinum 63 - Metro 2033 Redux Im so glad I decided to give this game another try after quitting it last year. I really enjoyed it! #PS4 #PlayStation #PlayStation4 #PSshare #PlayStationTrophy #PlatinumTrophy #TrophyHunter #TrophyHunting #Metro2033 #Metro2033Redux https://t.co/JtWeM5x7xs
Heres some random pictures of my babies, if anyone needs a smile https://t.co/1R8reQCDd2
@TexasJase Thanks! I bought so many super cheap games during that Indie sale on PS in March, and theyve all been a ton of fun!

Finished up my first playthrough of Metro 2033 Redux in Survivor mode. Im glad I gave this game a second chance because Im really enjoying it now. I have to do a second playthrough in Spartan mode farm some kill-related trophies, then Ill be finished on to my next game! https://t.co/TC0iL9HwGN
RT @thegamerMOON: My *Bank Holiday weekend plans How about you? https://t.co/nCTjLKMhUF
@Helexzura ...told itll get better doesnt usually feel true in the moment. Just remember people love and care about you, and the dark does eventually pass.

@Helexzura Im sorry to hear youre dealing with that. Depression has been hitting me hard the past few months so I get it. Nights are the worst, especially when my husbands already gone to bed I cant sleep I just feel super alone. I know being....

@UncleGamer1 No I havent. I actually bought Metro Redux (which includes the definitive versions of both 2033 and Last Light) so I could play them before I played Exodus, but then I never ended up playing any of them. If I enjoy 2033, Ill eventually play Last Light and Exodus.

@GamingGuruBTips You can do it! I think I did it in four or five days. If you follow the psnprofiles trophy guide, you only have to keep replaying the last few chapters for all the different endings. Good luck and have fun!

Im going to try to play Metro 2033 again. I started it last summer but only played the first two chapters. Im hoping Ill enjoy it more now I accidentally deleted my save data from before though, so Im having to start over #PS4 #PlayStation #PSshare #Metro2033Redux https://t.co/LigwGcSc7Q
@Dru8376 I need this but with cats instead of dogs.

@Dru8376 Do it! It was fun
@SaurbaughJason I really liked it too! I havent played Rime yet.
@SaurbaughJason Thanks! Mooseman was enjoyable. Some of the puzzle solutions were a bit obscure, but it was fun.

Im sad I cant play Returnal yet, but Im am so HYPED for all of you who are playing and loving it!! I love seeing all your posts!

@UncleGamer1 Abz doesnt have a platinum, but it only took 2-3 hours to complete and is definitely worth playing! Plus its free on PlayStation right now I havent played Vampyr yet though.

ABZ - 100% Completion This game was so mesmerizing and relaxing, and I loved interacting with all the ocean life #PS4 #PlayStation #PSshare #PlayAtHome #FreeGame #ABZU #TrophyHunter #TrophyHunting #IndieGames https://t.co/QFiPfD0wei
@UncleGamer1 Yes, I earned the Plat for it. Its a fairly easy and short one if you look up a guide to help with finding the collectibles. Best of luck and have fun!

Platinum 59 - Virginia I really liked this story and the animation. The ending was pretty open to interpretation and I enjoyed reading theories about it online after I finished the game. #PS4 #PlayStation #PSshare #PlatinumTrophy #TrophyHunter #TrophyHunting #Virginia https://t.co/yPzGa2g3FN
The May PS Plus free games should be announced later today. Fingers crossed for a great selection
@PSACCESSFANS @NathanDitum It says Ive already done the survey
@b_tben Ive got a GameFly subscription for at least a month, so I will probably end up playing Nier Automata soon.

@b_tben I know!! I keep putting off buying it because I already have so many games I havent played, plus I keep hoping itll be a PS+ free game. And yes, I agree about Godfall (I dont have a PS5, but I wouldnt pay for Godfall if I did)
@UncleGamer1 Hes not on Twitter. But trust me, hell figure it out because I absolutely wont be subtle about it
And by dropping hints, I mean saying yo, buy this game I wont be subtle. I cant wait for this beautiful game!!

If nothing changes, Kena: Bridge of Spirits drops 2 days before the 13 year anniversary of when my husband I started dating (yes, we still celebrate our dating anniversary). If he doesnt buy it for me Ill be so sad, so I guess its time to start dropping hints now https://t.co/KJJtRjDCZv

@b_tben Id love to see Nier Automata but Ive been saying that for months . Maybe a Star Wars game since the free games will drop on May the Fourth? And I feel like Godfall might be a possibility for the PS5 game.

Yall, I somehow didnt realize Returnal was a PS5 exclusive and thought Id be able to get it on PS4. Now Im heartbroken!!

@UncleGamer1 Im not very far in - Ive only managed to play a little bit because depression has been kicking my ass these past few days I think the mission Im about to do it called Mushrooms in the Deep. Im really enjoying it so far!
RT @PlayStation: We stand with the Black community as the verdict has been reached in the George Floyd trial. This is a first step, but the

@imtheirwifenow I think its great that companies, regardless of size, are speaking up about social issues like this. It shows that they care more about whats right and about driving positive change than staying quiet about these issues in hopes of not losing any customers/money.
@u_wot_m8te I think it looks great but I always worry Ill be disappointed when I drop that much money on a game.
@FinalFae But my backlog... Ive been seeing a lot of hype about it so itll def be added to my wishlist though.
@u_wot_m8te I totally blanked on Returnal when I posted mine Ill actually probably purchase it before I purchase Nier.
@UncleGamer1 I just started this a few days ago and was thinking the exact same thing. Its a beautiful environment.
